title: Ability Check
content:
lass is the number you must roll with the D20 to pass the ability check. The task difficulty when performing a DC are:

Very Easy: 5 Easy: 10 Medium: 15 Hard: 20 Very Hard: 25 Nearly Impossible: 30

For Nearly impossible cases, you have to have a very high Ability Modifier, other bonuses and almost a perfect 20 roll on the die.
